description:
A massive shadow appears in the skies and throws the city into chaos! Who would have thought Leviathan would apprealize, too? Haru gets the Gaiamon chip, but can he bring back his best friend Yujin?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bonds of Hope! Haru and Gaiamon!!
Kibou no Kizuna! Haru to Gaeamon!!
希望の絆! ハルとガイアモン!!
